The image was previously shared in 2016: indicating that it has been circulating for several years with different hurricane attributions.
The image was found to be a doctored pho: created by the satire website People of Lancaster, based on a genuine photograph of Hurricane Frances taken by Associated Press photographer Douglas Clifford in 2004.
A comparison was made between the genuin: clearly showing the addition of the dolphin in the latter.
The source of the claim was identified a: which initially shared the image in 2016 with the Hurricane Matthew attribution and later republished the article with the Hurricane Dorian attribution in 2019.
